email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, I was hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton. Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per ton, which I believe is competitive given the vessel's specifications. The laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 per ton is acceptable. However, I would like to request a slight adjustment on the laytime to 96 hours total, given the potential for delays at the load port. Also, could we cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day? Looking forward to your confirmation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to 96 hours of laytime and a demurrage cap of $18,000 per day. The final freight rate will be $51.00 per ton. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with these terms. Please confirm your acceptance, and I’ll proceed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Thanks for your flexibility. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and the vessel will be ready for loading at Houston. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
